Context: George Brown College is open today with lab school child care centers and WAVE dental clinics operating. Students are advised to check their email or STU-VIEW for class changes or cancellations. Those unable to attend classes due to weather conditions should discuss it with their instructors. Updates on college operations will be posted on the website, X (formerly Twitter), Facebook, and Instagram. Information about Continuing Education classes can be found on the website. Students are encouraged to allow extra time for commuting. The contact information for George Brown College is 416-415-2000 for voice calls, 1-877-515-5559 for TTY, and ask.george@georgebrown.ca for inquiries. The college's social media hub can also be visited. The information on the website is subject to change without notice and should not be considered as offers or warranties. Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
